plays.text: Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Holding Joel Kwiatkowski
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Igor Larionov

Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Roughing Mike Grier
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Rick Berry 5 minutes for Fighting Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 5 minutes for Fighting Rick Berry
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for Interference Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Roughing Rick Berry
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Interference Jeff Halpern
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Holding Kip Miller
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for Hooking Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Sergei Gonchar assisted by Robert Lang and Brendan Witt
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Mathieu Dandenault
Penalty to Brian Sutherby 2 minutes for Slashing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Brian Sutherby 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
